long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to experience the ultimate retro football action with NFL Retro Bowl ‘25! 🎮 This Chrome extension brings the nostalgic charm of 8-bit football to your fingertips, letting you manage your team, call the plays, and lead your squad to victory. 🏆

✨ Key Features:

Strategic Gameplay: Call offensive and defensive plays to outsmart your opponents. 🧠
Team Customization: Build and upgrade your dream roster. 💪
Thrilling Matches: Score touchdowns, intercept passes, and dominate the field! 🚀
Retro Visuals: Classic pixel-art style with modern, responsive controls. 🎨
Championship Mode: Take your team through the playoffs and win the Retro Bowl! 🏅
🎉 Why Install?

Play anytime, anywhere—no downloads required!
Immerse yourself in fast-paced football action with addictive gameplay.
Relive the magic of retro games combined with modern-day features.
